ClientApplication

Class CompileAndRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClientApplication.CompileAndRun

  • public abstract class CompileAndRun
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for compiling and running source codes. The machine is assumed to be at least Windows XP or later. This class should not have any instance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CompileAndRun()

    • Method Detail

      • CompileCode

        public static boolean CompileCode(java.io.File codeFile,
                  java.io.Writer writer)
        Compiles a code and write output to a writer. Supports only Java, C++, and ANSI-C.
        Parameters:
        codeFile - Code file to compile.
        writer - Writer to put outputs.
        Returns:
        True on success; False otherwise.

      • getClassName

        public static java.lang.String getClassName(java.io.File codeFile)
                                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gets the name of the class for running Java program.
        Parameters:
        codeFile - Original source code file path.
        Returns:
        Chosen class name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • RunProgram

        public static boolean RunProgram(java.io.File codeFile)
        Runs a Java, C++ or ANSI C program.
        Parameters:
        codeFile - Path to source code file.
        Returns:
        True on success; False otherwise.
